original_text: Then the king will say to those people who are at his left side, “Go away from me. God has decided to punish you. He has prepared a fire that will burn for ever. He has prepared it for Satan and his servants. You will also go into that fire.
korean_text: 또 왼편에 있는 자들에게 이르시되 저주를 받은 자들아 나를 떠나 마귀와 그 사자들을 위하여 예비된 영원한 불에 들어가라

sentences.original_text: Then the king will say to those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 왕이 그 사람들에게 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who are at his left side
God has decided to punish you
He has prepared it for Satan
You will also go into that fire
sentences.korean_translation: 너희도 그 불 속으로 들어갈 것이다
